snippet: The N.F.L. said an officiating mistake left the Redskins confused over the down and the distance to go for a first down on their final drive during the Giants’ victory Sunday night.
abstract: NFL says officials erred at the end of the New York Giants’ game with the Washington Redskins when they chose not to stop play after there was confusion about the down and the distance to go for a first down during the Redskins’ final drive; Giants ended up winning the game 24-17.
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. said an officiating mistake left the Redskins confused over the down and the distance to go for a first down on their final drive during the Giants’ victory Sunday night.

headline.main: Officials Erred in Mix-Up Near End of Giants Game
headline.print_headline: Officials Erred in Mix-Up Near End of Giants Game
